Author: dansla116
Text: I get this. I really do. Just spend my days waiting until the clock says its time to eat while looking at pictures of food that tastes better than mine. What are you supposed to do? If you actually go out and eat the food, you get a brief a moment of happiness followed by a days worth of regret. It doesn't change anything. What does it even accomplish? You just delay reaching your potentially unreachable goal.
